verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H6664>right<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H7181>attend<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry<s%>, give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, that goes <S%H3808>not<s%> out of <S%H4820>feigned<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Let my <S%H4941>sentence<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> from your <S%H6440>presence<s%>; let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%> the things that are <S%H4339>equal<s%>.

You have <S%H974>proved<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; you have <S%H6485>visited<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night<s%>; you have <S%H6884>tried<s%> <S%H4672>me<s%>, and shall find <S%H2161>nothing<s%>; I am purposed that my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall not <S%H5674>transgress<s%>.
Concerning the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of your <S%H8193>lips<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> me from the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6530>destroyer<s%>.
Hold <S%H8551>up<s%> my <S%H838>goings<s%> in your <S%H4570>paths<s%>, that my <S%H6471>footsteps<s%> slip <S%H4131>not<s%>.
I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H6030>you<s%>, for you will hear <S%H410>me<s%>, O God: <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, and hear my <S%H565>speech<s%>.

Show your <S%H6395>marvelous<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O you that <S%H3467>save<s%> by your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> them which put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in you from those that rise up against <S%H6965>them<s%>.
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of the <S%H1323>eye<s%>, <S%H5641>hide<s%> me under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings<s%>,
<S%H6440>From<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> <S%H7703>oppress<s%> <S%H5315>me<s%>, from my deadly <S%H341>enemies<s%>, who compass me <S%H5362>about<s%>.
They are <S%H5462>enclosed<s%> in their own <S%H2459>fat<s%>: with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1348>proudly<s%>.
They have now <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> us in our <S%H838>steps<s%>: they have <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to throw us <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>;
<S%H1825>Like<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> that is <S%H3700>greedy<s%> of his <S%H2963>prey<s%>, and as it were a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H3427>lurking<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places<s%>.

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H6923>disappoint<s%> <S%H6440>him<s%>, cast him <S%H3766>down<s%>: <S%H6403>deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, which is your <S%H2719>sword<s%>:

From <S%H4962>men<s%> which are your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, from <S%H4962>men<s%> of the <S%H2465>world<s%>, which have their <S%H2506>portion<s%> in this <S%H2416>life<s%>, and whose <S%H990>belly<s%> you <S%H4390>fill<s%> with your <S%H6840>hid<s%> <S%H7646>treasure<s%>: they are full of <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H3240>leave<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of their substance to their <S%H5768>babes<s%>.
As for <S%H2372>me<s%>, I will behold your <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: I shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>, when I <S%H6974>awake<s%>, with your <S%H8544>likeness<s%>.
